summary: Verified wallet page font size fix and 'Money You Can Spend' label change. All 7 tests passed. Total now correctly shows ₹49 (sum of available balances) instead of ₹99 (total balance). Savings and Investing jars display large readable fonts (text-lg/text-2xl) for 'Available' and 'In Goals/Invested' labels.
passed_tests: ✅ TEST 1: 'Money You Can Spend' label is displayed (not 'Total Balance')
✅ TEST 2: Total shows ₹49 (sum of available balances only)
✅ TEST 3b: Savings jar shows 'In Goals:' label
✅ TEST 3c: Savings jar has large fonts (text-lg/text-2xl)
✅ TEST 4c: Investing jar has large fonts (text-lg/text-2xl)
✅ TEST 5: Spending jar shows regular balance (no breakdown)
✅ TEST 6: Gifting jar shows regular balance (no breakdown)
✅ TEST 7: Subtitle 'Available across all your jars' is displayed

verified_fixes.font_size_fix: Savings and Investing jars now use text-lg for labels and text-2xl for amounts - clearly readable for children
verified_fixes.total_balance_fix: Total now shows 'Money You Can Spend: ₹49' instead of 'Total Balance: ₹99'
verified_fixes.calculation_fix: Total is calculated from sum of available_balance fields (49 + 0 + 0 + 0 = ₹49)

critical_code_review_comments: WalletPage.jsx line 299: Correctly shows 'Money You Can Spend' label
WalletPage.jsx line 198: Correctly calculates totalAvailable from available_balance
WalletPage.jsx lines 326-341: Correctly uses text-lg and text-2xl for large readable fonts
Backend wallet.py line 106: Correctly returns total_available field
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data - test child has Spending ₹49, Savings ₹50 (₹100 in goals, available=₹0), Investing ₹0, Gifting ₹0
context_for_next_testing_agent: Font size fix and 'Money You Can Spend' label verified working. Test child 'Aashi M' has: Spending ₹49, Savings jar with ₹50 balance but ₹100 in goals (available=₹0), Investing ₹0, Gifting ₹0. Total available = ₹49. All fonts are now large and child-friendly.
